projects.description:
# Test Project

This is a **test project** to verify that portfolio data loads correctly from JSON in the PS3 XMB interface.

## Features

- Markdown rendering with `react-markdown`
- Scrollable content area
- Syntax highlighting for code
- Beautiful PS3-themed styling

### Code Example

```javascript
const portfolio = {
  name: 'Test Developer',
  skills: ['React', 'TypeScript', 'Next.js']
};
```

### Links

Check out the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/testuser/test-project) for more information.

> This is a blockquote to test markdown rendering.
